segments.text: What kind of movies do you like , Sue ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like all kinds of stuff . I admit I love romance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just like my wife . So , what ’ s your favorite movie ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean my favorite movie of all time ? I guess I ’ d have to say “ pretty woman ” .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , my wife likes that one , too . Personally , I prefer action movies .
segments.speaker: S1
